text: ABC on Tuesday launched The Conners, a spinoff ( so to speak ) of the short - lived Roseanne revival, which was torpedoed when … you know. So how did the highly anticipated continuation address the elephant in the room? Read on to find out … The premiere picks up fewer than three months after the events of the revival, and just three weeks after the death of Roseanne Conner. The family is gathered in the kitchen, still in mourning after Roseanne ’ s supposed heart attack. We ’ re told she died in her sleep, and Dan ’ s been sleeping on the couch ever since.
